title: Chicken paprikash with dumplings
ingredients: ['3 eggs, beaten', '125ml water', '375g plain flour', '2 teaspoons salt', '4 tablespoons butter', '675g bone-in chicken pieces, with skin', '1 medium onion, chopped', '350ml water', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '250ml soured cream']
